title: Literary Argument - investigation of a mystery

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how the investigation of the mystery contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how the investigation of the mystery contributes to an interpretation of the work as a whole.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and describe how plot orders events in a narrative.
